choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, or cashews
### Assistant:

Sure, I can help you with that! Here is a sample meal plan for today that meets your dietary restrictions:

Breakfast:
- Oatmeal (without milk) with sliced banana and diced peaches
- Black coffee (without sugar or cream)

Snack:
- Apple slices with almond butter (without cashews)

Lunch:
- Grilled chicken breast (without honey) with roasted sweet potato wedges and steamed broccoli
- Water (without lemon or lime)

Dinner:
- Baked salmon (without dairy or garlic) with roasted asparagus and quinoa
- Sparkling water (without any added flavors)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or dietary restrictions that I can assist you with.
